*¿Qué atracciones principales puedo visi: *What main attractions can I visit if I stay for 1 day?*
Llegando la noche anterior o el mismo dí: Arriving the night before or the same day before noon, you can take advantage of the time to visit the Argentinian side of the Falls, the tour takes approximately five hours. It can be extended to seven hours if you include the Great Adventure.
🚐 _¿Cómo llegar?_ La mejor forma es en B: 🚐 _How to get there?_ The best way is by bus with the Río Uruguay company, from the bus terminal, which is a seven-block distance from our hostel.
⚠️ _A tener en cuenta:_ Los buses salen: ⚠️ _Please note:_ Buses leave every 30 minutes, we recommend bringing insect repellent, water, and a change of clothes if you're doing the Great Adventure.
💳 _Métodos de pago bus y Parque:_ Efecti: 💳 _Payment methods for bus and park:_ Cash (Argentinian pesos) and card.
Llegando el mismo día después del mediod: Arriving the same day after noon, you can visit the Brazilian side of the Falls, with an average tour duration of four hours.
🚐 _¿Cómo llegar?_ La mejor forma es en B: 🚐 _How to get there?_ The best way is by bus from the bus terminal, which is a seven-block distance from our hostel.
⚠️ _A tener en cuenta:_ Hay dos empresas: ⚠️ _Please note:_ There are two bus companies: Río Uruguay and Crucero del Norte. Buses depart every 50 minutes. Bring ID/passport, water, and insect repellent. Complete Argentinian immigration.
💳 _Métodos de pago bus y Parque:_ Efecti: 💳 _Payment methods for bus and park:_ Cash (Argentinian pesos and Brazilian reais) and card.
🛍️ *Al regresar de Cataratas lado brasil: 🛍️ *On the way back from the Brazilian side of the Falls, you can stop by the Duty-Free shop, which is close to the border.*
Si querés *volver*, solo decimelo 🔙: If you want to *go back*, just let me know 🔙
*¿Qué atracciones principales puedo visi: *What main attractions can I visit if I stay for 2 days?*
Si el día anterior fuiste a Cataratas la: If the day before you visited the Argentinian side of the Falls 🇦🇷 and missed something, you can take advantage of the 50% discount offered by the park and complete the activity.
Si fuiste al lado de Brasil 🇧🇷, se puede: If you went to the Brazilian side 🇧🇷, you can visit the Argentinian side of the Falls.
*¿Qué otras cosas puedo hacer si tengo m: *What other things can I do if I have more time/after returning from the Park?*
*Hito Tres fronteras:* Es un paseo coste: *Tres Borders Landmark:* It's a coastal walk and tourist attraction where the Paraná River and the Iguazú River converge, allowing you to see the borders of three countries at the same time (Argentina, Brazil, and Paraguay).
*Mirador Escondido:* Es un parque junto: *Hidden Viewpoint:* It’s a park by the river, perfect for watching the sunset.
🐊 *Güirá Oga:* Es un refugio de animales: 🐊 *Güirá Oga:* It’s an animal refuge that invites reflection on the need to protect wildlife and its environment. *(Hours: 9 AM to 4:30 PM)*
🛖 *Aripuca:* Construído a base de árbole: 🛖 *Aripuca:* Built from rescued trees, inspired by a typical trap of the Guarani people. *(Hours: 9 AM to 6 PM)*
💦 *Salto Mbocay:* Tres cascadas naturale: 💦 *Salto Mbocay:* Three natural waterfalls and dense vegetation. *(Hours: 9 AM to 4 PM)*
🚤 *Paseo en catamarán:* Navegación por l: 🚤 *Catamaran ride:* Navigation through the Iguazú and Paraná rivers during sunset, to enjoy it in a different way.
🧗🏻‍♀️ *FlyPark:* Juego de aventura de ci: 🧗🏻‍♀️ *FlyPark:* Adventure game with five levels. Hanging bridges and zipline. *(Hours: 10 AM to 6 PM)*
🧊 *IceBar:* Duración 30 min. Barra libre: 🧊 *IceBar:* Duration 30 minutes. Open bar and live DJs in an ice bar. *(Hours: 3 PM to 11 PM)*
